hints.content: Nora put her marbles into $4$ rows with $1$ marble in each row.

This array shows $\blueE4$ rows with $\purpleD1$ marble in each row.

![A group of marbles in 4 rows with 1 marble in each row. The marbles are labeled with number 1 at the top and the rows are labeled 1 through 4 at the left.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/81df4d049b757ee290afc173f7d3900d1cb74fba)

This image shows how Nora organized her marbles: 

![A group of marbles in 4 rows with 1 marble in each row.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a850ad72da6024c47359f4bdc24e3c05fd90d6d4)

question.content:
Nora is organizing her marbles. She put them in $4$ rows with $1$ marble in each row.

**Which image below shows how Nora organized her marbles?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A group of marbles in 4 rows with 1 marble in each row.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a850ad72da6024c47359f4bdc24e3c05fd90d6d4)
![A group of marbles in 4 rows with 4 marbles in each row.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6733f8076d0eaa4c3a9cffa00317a15e4ab98df6)
![A group of marbles in 5 rows with 1 marble in each row.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0f78a1585cc2cd660c4f0b4a9587a2f8207c484e)
